titleStmt.title: The Parliaments resolution concerning the sending of Sir Thomas Barrington and M. Grimston to Colchester for the pacification of an uproare of 2000 men gathered together upon the discovering and apprehending of Sir Iohn Lucas ... : declared in a letter sent from the maior of Colchester to the House of Commons directed to M. John Pym, and read in the said House upon ... the 26 of August ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
